name: In-Store Gift Card Verification
technique_description: The fraudster uses legitimate functions inside a bricks-and-mortar store to verify status of gift cards. The fraudster may use kiosks, checkout or customer service to verify legitimacy of a gift card.

details: Require an access code that is separate from the gift card number before revealing the status and funds on the gift cards.
Monitor for gift cards a person is attempting to verify.
